entry.title: Project Shattercore
entry.summary:
Author: rikaisdeadx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,023Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 74

Summary: you were taken so young—too young to remember anything but needles and pain. locked in a lab that never quieted, they amplified every whisper of thought within you, reshaping you into something beyond what you should have been. after endless experiments, your rescuer finally arrives.he’s tall, shadowed by secrets, and undeniably frightening… yet somehow, he offers you a place to belong. in the vast, silent halls of his mansion, you feel invisible—an outsider blamed for every strange glance. but as days pass and walls of stone seem to soften, the people here begin to notice you. they smile. they reach out. and you start to wonder: is this longing in their eyes… normal?

entry.summary:
Author: ly_garden

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,481Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 74

entry.title: Opposites Attract
entry.summary:
Author: nowaywhyamihere

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 78,361Chapters: 40/?Kudos: 724

Summary: Damian Wayne doesn’t notice people—unless they give him a reason to. Most are too loud, too fake, or too eager to impress someone with his last name. But her? She was different. Always smiling, even at him. Always kind, even when he gave her nothing. He didn’t understand it, but he remembered it. And that was new.

entry.title: THE SPIDER (Yandere! Batfam x reader)
entry.summary:
Author: mavimoon

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,847Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 110

Summary: Gotham is a city that devours color.[Name] knows this better than anyone.Now, thrust into the gilded cage of Wayne Manor, she finds herself a stranger among fractured souls: a father who won’t meet her eyes, brothers who guard their wounds like weapons, and a butler whose kindness feels like the last candle in a storm.But Gotham’s gray is a lie, cause beneath its concrete skin, something pulses, a spectrum only she can see. The Bat may own the night, but [Name] carries her mother’s defiance in her veins: where they carve shadows, she will paint fire.

entry.title: I've Been The Archer, I've Been The Prey
entry.summary:
Author: Totallynotashieldagent

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,929Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 679

Summary: Reader's father and Bruce arranged for her and Damian to marry. However, before Reader's father could truly sit and explain to her his decision he passed away. And Damian never thought to question his father's decision at all.Reader's mother only saw dollar signs for this arrangement and forced it to happen much quicker than ever anticipated. Now it's just two strangers that have been forced together and trying to navigate the expectations of becoming the new IT couple of Gotham while trying to keep their secrets under wraps as Reader learns what it means to be the new Wayne Matriarch since the death of Martha Wayne.

entry.title: Between the Pages on the Shelf
entry.summary:
Author: JayM00n

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,244Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 71

Summary: Damian Wayne has never been one to dwell on romance. He had never really found the right person, and he was too busy - with patrol and school. It was dangerous as well, for him and anyone who caught his eye. At least that what he tells himself as he enters the school library. And yet, every excuse and fear was wiped from his mind as he spotted you.

entry.title: Under Protection
entry.summary:
Author: Nightly_Darkk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 715Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 8

Summary: The mission sounded simple at first: protect Gotham's most infamous vigilantes in their civilian skins. The reality? Nothing is simple in Wayne Manor. The secrets there cling like shadows to the wall and for all of Batman's insistence of strategy, it's starting to feel a lot more like scheming. The BatBoys are restless, sharp, always watching. Constantly bristling at the idea of being protected.And in the middle of it all is her. A girl so unaware of the storm coming closer to her door each day. She isn't supposed to be there. She isn't even supposed to matter. But she does- and no one can say why. The was told to protect them. Nobody said what they'd have to protect themselves from.

entry.title: The Demon Spawn Surveillance Strategy (The DSSS)
entry.summary:
Author: YourLocalGothamite

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 95,123Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 303

Summary: It starts with Jon Kent's horrible lies.It ends with three grown (only physically) men in tactical gear, desperately clinging to a rooftop, watching Damian Wayne get his cheeks squished (!!??) by a girl (WHAT!!???) in a pink hoodie.The Batboys started to notice something was off with Damian, all because of Jon. Damian would come up with weird excuses. Disappearing. Showing up with a weird look in his eye. (??) So naturally, they did what any loving brothers would do: launched a full-scale spy mission.The DSSS includes but is not limited to:- Unauthorized rooftop stakeouts- Theoretical witchcraft accusations- A whiteboard- Red string- Glitter glueAnd many more. Stay tuned for the emotional rollercoaster Damian unknowingly sends his brothers on ;).
